doc.name: AverageOverTime
doc.description: An actor to compute the average of the input values received so far over model time. This actor can fire whenever there is a token at its input port, or the model time has advanced since last firing. It records the last token that it received. In each firing, the produce of the last token and the amount of model time increment is added to a sum variable. The average value received so far is obtained by dividing the sum by the current model time. This average is sent to the output port in each firing. If a token is available at the input port, this actor reads that token and overwrites the last token with it.
